name: Frank The Farmer CG
description:
An Evil King demands an ever increasing amount of food from his serfs. You play as Frank the farmer, a family man with a wife and two kids. If you don’t supply the kingdom with enough food each week the King threatens to punish you. 

Move cards from your hand into the field to increase your food value. If you run out of food, you lose!

WARNING: GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT

I had spent a large portion of my time learning how to create a game primarily through the UI components of unity. This is my first ever game that doesnt have character controller. 

-Matthew Lyons
